[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/rig-package](./rig-package.md) &gt; [IRigConfig](./rig-package.irigconfig.md) &gt; [filePath](./rig-package.irigconfig.filepath.md)

## IRigConfig.filePath property

The full path to the `rig.json` file that was found, or `""` if none was found.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly filePath: string;
```

## Remarks

Example: `/path/to/your-project/config/rig.json`
